src:
Lagu Nasional dan Daerah Mulai Diputar di Candi Arjuna Dieng
05 Nov 2019, 10:33 by Uje Hartono


Candi Arjuna Dieng (Foto: Uje Hartono/detikcom)

Banjarnegara - Ada yang baru di Candi Arjuna, Dieng. Mulai hari ini, Selasa (5/11/2019), di objek wisata tersebut akan diperdengarkan lagu-lagu nasional dan daerah.Jika ingin mendengarkan lagu-lagu nasional dan daerah seraya menikmati pemandangan candi dan sejuknya udara pegunungan, datanglah pagi atau sore hari. Sebab, lagu-lagu nasional dan daerah ini akan diputar pada pagi dan sore hari."Mulai hari, di komplek Candi Arjuna diputar lagu-lagu nasional dan daerah. Waktunya pagi hari mulai pukul 07.00 WIB sampai pukul 08.00 WIB. Sedangkan untuk sore hari diputar sebelum tutup," kata Kepala UPT Pengelolaan Objek Wisata Banjarnegara Aryadi Darwanto saat dihubungi detikcom, Selasa (5/11/2019).


Keindahan Candi Arjuna Dieng. (Foto: Uje Hartono/detikcom)

Lagu daerah yang diputar tidak hanya dari daerah Jawa Tengah, tapi juga dari daerah lain di Indonesia. Adapun daftar lagu yang diputar di komplek Candi Arjuna di antaranya Indonesia Pusaka, Tanah Airku, Rayuan Pulau Kelapa, Untuk Indonesiaku, Soleram, Rasa Sayange, O Inani Keke, dan Gending Sriwijaya."Pemutaran lagu nasional dan daerah ini menjadi hal baru di objek Wisata Candi Arjuna. Selain itu diharapkan akan menambah rasa cinta tanah air," harapnya.Sementara ini, pemutaran lagu-lagu nasional dan daerah baru dilakukan di kompek Candi Arjuna dan Museum Kaliasa di Dieng. Untuk obyek wisata lainnya di Dieng masih dalam pembahasan."Sementara ini lagu-lagu nasional dan daerah baru diputar di komplek Candi Arjuna dan Museum Kaliasa," ujarnya.Simak Video "Pesona Candi Arjuna Dieng "[Gambas:Video 20detik](msl/krs)
text:
National and Regional Songs Played at Arjuna Dieng Temple
05 Nov 2019, 10:33 by Uje Hartono


Arjuna Dieng Temple (Photo: Uje Hartono / detikcom)

Banjarnegara - There is a new one at Arjuna Temple, Dieng. Starting today, Tuesday (11/5/2019), national and regional songs will be played at these attractions. If you want to listen to national and regional songs while enjoying the views of the temple and the cool mountain air, come morning or evening. Because, national and regional songs will be played in the morning and evening. "Starting in the day, in the Arjuna Temple complex, national and regional songs are played. The time for the morning starts at 07.00 WIB until 08.00 WIB. While for the afternoon it is played before closing, "said Head of the Tourism Object Management Unit of Banjarnegara Aryadi Darwanto when contacted by AFP on Tuesday (11/05/2019).


The beauty of the Arjuna Dieng Temple. (Photo: Uje Hartono / detikcom)

Regional songs are played not only from the Central Java region, but also from other regions in Indonesia. The list of songs that are played in the Arjuna Temple complex include Indonesia Pusaka, Tanah Airku, Seduction of Coconut Island, For Indonesia, Soleram, Rasa Sayange, O Inani Keke, and Gending Sriwijaya. Arjuna Temple. In addition, it is hoped that it will add to the love of the motherland, "he hoped. Meanwhile, the screening of national and regional songs will only take place at the Arjuna Temple complex and the Kaliasa Museum in Dieng. For other tourist objects in Dieng still under discussion. "Meanwhile, national and regional songs are only being played in the Arjuna Temple complex and Kaliasa Museum," he said. Watch Video "The charm of Arjuna Dieng Temple" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (msl / krs )
